pkgmetadata.longdescription: Mapping the Prevalence of Binary Indicators using Survey Data in Small Areas // Provides a pipeline to perform small area estimation and prevalence mapping of binary indicators using health and demographic survey data, described in Fuglstad et al. (2022) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2110.09576 and Wakefield et al. (2020) doi:10.1111/insr.12400.
